data.text: @polioandme @RichardfromSyd1 @drajm @CaseyBriggs Our findings support maximizing coverage with third doses of vaccine in highly vaccinated populations such as in the United Kingdom. Further follow-up will be needed to assess protection against severe disease and the duration of protection after booster vaccination.

@polioandme @drajm @CaseyBriggs Eff vs what?
Do you have a link?

@RichardfromSyd1 @drajm @CaseyBriggs Latest paper in NEJM using n=~3x10m in UK show vaxx effec after 2xAZ+1mRNA fell to 64% at 5-9wks. Winter is coming, situation in flooded areas is dire, mask up now!
@RichardfromSyd1 @CaseyBriggs Meanwhile we vaccines are being thrown into the bin https://t.co/idGf3pFWOz

@RichardfromSyd1 @CaseyBriggs This is such glaring evidence of their criminal negligence in December—ending protections/restrictions, letting the vax contractor take four weeks holidays over xmas/new year as omicron arrived. This is Morrison’s worst legacy. And Perrottet’s only legacy. Bastards.

@dj1au @RichardfromSyd1 @CaseyBriggs The same people who told everyone it was ‘mild’ and meant the ‘end of pandemic’ are lecturing others about not promoting vaccination - strange they can’t see the contradiction that their own messaging has contributed to the lack of urgency and decline in vaccinations
@RichardfromSyd1 💩💩💩💩 why have the states not been pushing this!  We all know the elderly will die if not boosted… look at HK!

@bobepidemiology @CaseyBriggs We can actually do more than one thing at once Bob.
At least I used to think that …
